synopsis.text: Second music video animation for capsule's NEXUS-2060 concept, set in a sprawling space station city orbiting Earth in 2060, brings a thrilling tale of a young woman's unexpected adventure. As she cruises through the vibrant space station in her pink car, she finds herself in a collision with a supermodel's vehicle. Fueled by annoyance, she embarks on a high-speed chase that ultimately leads her to a fashion show. Directed by MOMOSE Yoshiyuki and produced by Studio Kajino, a Ghibli offshoot, this captivating anime music video was released as part of the Ghibli ga Ippai Special: Short Short disc in 2005.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
